title: Eyelash Extension and Lash Lift
headline: Become an expert on eyelash extension and lash lift treatments for professional development in this free online course.
description: Learn to skillfully perform eyelash extension and lash curl treatments to grow your business and impress clientele. This course introduces the tools required, procedures and industry standards for hygiene in the work environment. You will also learn to select the best lashes suitable for the different natural lash lengths and discover how to choose the best shields to give the curl effect that is sure to satisfy your clients.
courseDescription:
Are you a beautician looking to improve or gain quality skills in eyelash treatments? Your instructor, Kristina Bagrova, is a certified, award-winning beautician with more than thirteen years of experience in the beauty field. While living in Lithuania, Kristina started to work from home and grew to have a large beauty and hair salon with ten staff in the heart of the tourist city of Klaipeda. At present, she runs two beauty salons and has her own beauty school in Luxembourg. In this course, you will learn about eyelash extensions, which enhance the appearance of a person's eyelashes. It is a non-surgical procedure that attaches false lashes to a client's natural eyelashes, making them look naturally longer and fuller.

The course discusses the tools, hygiene and work environment standards required to perform this task professionally. Delve into the practical steps of applying false lashes. After cleaning the client's lashes with a primer and correctly covering the lower lashes with patches, learn to skilfully pick individual lashes, dip them in glue and carefully place them on the upper lashes. Although you should touch up the eyelashes between two to six weeks, false eyelashes can last two or three months even without retouching. Explore the three methods for proper extension removal using a special remover in liquid, cream or gel form.

Finally, the course demonstrates the procedure for lash curling or lash lift. Lash curling is a treatment for those who want their own eyelashes to be curlier and create the impression of more volume and longer natural eyelashes. There are considerations when choosing the right eye shields to achieve specific results. With the lash lift treatment, after initial preparation of covering the lower lashes with a patch and placing the shields carefully, you will follow simple steps to curl and tint the natural lashes. If you are a professional seeking to add to your skills or a newbie in the industry, you will find these treatments profitable for you and your clients. Sign up and start learning today.
